name: 2D Police Pursuit
description:
Ever wanted to be a police officer? Well, now is your change.

In this fun new 2d racing game, you get join the police force, and get to work your way up to breaking up a gang of smugglers.

With a number of missions, including chasing down cars, waiting in ambush, arresting suspects, and more.

A great fun game.

Includes a tutorial that teaches you exactly what to do.
